entry.title: $2550 // Unit receives a ♣♣ ton of natural sunlight through -
entry.content:
Please call or text Vaner at show contact info • and mention the ID# 21374
1 Bed / 1 Bath in Park Slope, Brooklyn. 400 square feet, Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: 15 St - Prospect Park. Newly amazingly renovated 1br apt - Unit receives a ton of natural sunlight through - Large open kitchen living combo with stainless appliances and dishwasher - Beautiful exposed brick walls - Large queen sized bedroom with spacious closet - Dual Ac/Heating throughout - Light ceilings - In unit Laundry - Apt across street from Prospect Park West - Walking distance to G station!

AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Washer dryer installed
Exposed Brick
Natural Light in Living Area
Granite countertops
